properties.Name: SaleOfGoodsOnConsignmentAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementEffectiveDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Agreement becomes effective.

Columns.Name: ConsignmentOfGoodsSection
Columns.Description: This section identifies the goods (products) that are provided on consignment and the terms for shipping those goods from the Consignor to the Consignee.

Columns.Name: TitleOfGoodsSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes that the Consignor owns the goods and they remain the Consignor's property until one of the Consignee's customers purchase them.

Columns.Name: LossOrDamageToGoodsSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes who is responsible for any loss or damage to the goods after they have been received by the Consignee, insurance that must be obtained as well as the amounts of insurance to be obtained.

Columns.Name: ReportOfSalesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how the Consignee will report sales to the Consignor - period of report, formula for payments, cash discounts for prompt payment or high sales volumes.

Columns.Name: RecordsSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how the Consignee shall keep records of Consignor goods in his possession and the means by which Consignor inventory is to be reported to the Consignor.

Columns.Name: TermAndTerminationSection
Columns.Description: This section provides the term of the Consignment arrangement, when and how that arrangement can be terminated, what happens to Consignor goods upon termination of the agreement and who will be for their return to the Consignor.

Columns.Name: IndemnitySection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how claims against either party will be dealt with.

Columns.Name: FinancingStatementSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes that the Consignor can require Consignee to sign financing statements that verify that the Consignor actually owns the goods.

Columns.Name: BenefitSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes that the Consignee cannot assign the agreement to a third party without Consignor's prior permission.

Columns.Name: TaxesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes each party's responsibility for income and property taxes.

Columns.Name: FinalAgreementSection
Columns.Description: This section makes it clear that this is the final agreement between parties and replaces or supersedes any prior discussions or agreements.    Any amendments to this agreement must be made in writing.

Properties.Description: The Sale of Goods on Consignment Agreement addresses a Consignor providing goods to a Consignee, who then sells the goods.   Upon sales of the goods, the Consignee pays the Consignor for goods and returns any unsold goods.

properties.Description: The Sale of Goods on Consignment Agreement addresses a Consignor providing goods to a Consignee, who then sells the goods.   Upon sales of the goods, the Consignee pays the Consignor for goods and returns any unsold goods.
